actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Sales Tax Act to exempt certain food programs from the imposition of the sales tax.

summary.text: Provides, under the D.C. code, that in the District of Columbia sales of food or beverages to any person for use in the operation, by a nonprofit private voluntary organization, of a nonprofit food service program and sales of such food or beverages by such person in connection with such program shall be exempt from the imposition of the sales tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Sales Tax Act to exempt certain food programs from the imposition of the sales tax.
